channel.title: Random problem with keyboard
channel.description: Hey everyone, I have a gateway wired keyboard that game with the computer that randomly disconnects when I'm using it and takes a while to reconnect and load the driver again. I checked the driver but there were no problems with it and it's up to date. It is also plugged into a USB2 port that is in perfect condition. Any suggestions?

item.title: Random problem with keyboard
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

I’ve had the same problem with an external hard drive, turns out it was just a dodgy usb cable.
Try it with another computer and see if the problems persists? If so then the above is probably the case.

Read full topic

item.title: Random problem with keyboard
item.dc:creator: @Andrew_Ferguson The317Guy
item.description:
@Andrew_Ferguson wrote:

CoonHunter:

I have the issue at times. It ended up being the USB connection being loose. Might look into that.

Hmm, I’ve looked in the back and the USB ports all seem to be in perfect shape (computers only like 2 months old).

Read full topic

item.title: Random problem with keyboard

item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I have the issue at times. It ended up being the USB connection being loose. Might look into that.

item.title: Random problem with keyboard
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Get an HP keyboard!

Read full topic

item.title: Random problem with keyboard
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

It seems we are both having issues. it is possible the driver is not saving because there is no restart first? Try restarting your pc right after you install the driver.

You can also try looking to see if there is an updated one.

Read full topic
